If you go to Documentation section, you can find several methods for using Scramjet cloud platform services, i advice you to start with Get-Started section.

patterns: does scramjet have a cloud platform
responses: Scramjet is a Cloud Platform provider, additional information is found on the Web-Site Introduction Section

patterns: where can i find information on cli installation
responses: CLI section is located under SCP CLI section for more information on how to install CLI through terminal
you can also install CLI through the following command-line npm install -g @scramjet/cli

patterns: how can i used a test sample?
responses: Scramjet provides a simple walkthrough section for you to get started and run your first program under the get started section of SCP

patterns: where i can find info on api?
what is the api of scramjet?
what is the base api address?
responses: the base API is https://api.scramjet.cloud/api/v1/space/<SPACE-ID>/api/v1, more info at API section

patterns: can i use terminal to send request?
responses: use npm install -g @scramjet/cli commandline or go to CLI section in our documentation
I'm Sam a member of Scramjet team, currently im the 5th Gene

patterns: what are the methods of sdk ?
responses: information on Software Development Kit is found under SDK documentation section.

patterns: whom i should contact for help?
how can i contact customer service
my credit card is not working
responses: You can either call us during working hours or through email.
